short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple port scanner that work in private networks (no external service used to scan).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple port scanner that works in LANs without internet access since it uses chrome tcp functions to scan.

It's meant to be used by sysadmins and people who want to check their LAN for devices and open ports.

I created it since I'm a sysadmin and didn't find a Chrome native app that could scan in local networks without external services.
